class.name: VisualShader
class.brief_description: A custom shader program with a visual editor.
class.description: This class provides a graph-like visual editor for creating a [Shader]. Although [VisualShader]s do not require coding, they share the same logic with script shaders. They use [VisualShaderNode]s that can be connected to each other to control the flow of the shader. The visual shader graph is converted to a script shader behind the scenes.

method.name: add_node
method.description: Adds the specified [param node] to the shader.

method.name: add_varying
method.description: Adds a new varying value node to the shader.

method.name: attach_node_to_frame
method.description: Attaches the given node to the given frame.

method.name: can_connect_nodes
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the specified nodes and ports can be connected together.

method.name: connect_nodes
method.description: Connects the specified nodes and ports.

method.name: connect_nodes_forced
method.description: Connects the specified nodes and ports, even if they can't be connected. Such connection is invalid and will not function properly.

method.name: detach_node_from_frame
method.description: Detaches the given node from the frame it is attached to.

method.name: disconnect_nodes
method.description: Connects the specified nodes and ports.

method.name: get_node
method.description: Returns the shader node instance with specified [param type] and [param id].

method.name: get_node_connections
method.description: Returns the list of connected nodes with the specified type.

method.name: get_node_list
method.description: Returns the list of all nodes in the shader with the specified type.

method.name: get_node_position
method.description: Returns the position of the specified node within the shader graph.

method.name: get_valid_node_id
method.description: Returns next valid node ID that can be added to the shader graph.

method.name: has_varying
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the shader has a varying with the given [param name].

method.name: is_node_connection
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the specified node and port connection exist.

method.name: remove_node
method.description: Removes the specified node from the shader.

method.name: remove_varying
method.description: Removes a varying value node with the given [param name]. Prints an error if a node with this name is not found.

method.name: replace_node
method.description: Replaces the specified node with a node of new class type.

method.name: set_mode
method.description: Sets the mode of this shader.

method.name: set_node_position
method.description: Sets the position of the specified node.

members.member: The offset vector of the whole graph.
